posts.title: a
posts.author: a
posts.description: City of joy and love and culture. A lot of memories is attached with it. Didnt realized the beauty as long as i were there, but now that i'm far far away, u come to my mind everyday with different looks and views and keep making me nostalgic. No matter whereever i go, i'll never forget u my little city of joy, u'll always br the closest to my heart.
